mapper.select: SELECT c.custid as cust_custid, od.orderdetailid, od.orderlistid, od.itemid, i.itemplace as item_place, i.estart as item_estart, i.efin as item_efin, i.itemname as item_itemname, i.itemimg as item_itemimg, ol.ordercnt as orderlist_ordercnt, ol.orderdate as orderlist_orderdate, ol.candate as orderlist_candate FROM orderdetail od INNER JOIN orderlist ol ON ol.orderlistid = od.orderlistid INNER JOIN customer c ON ol.custid = c.custid INNER JOIN item i ON od.itemid = i.itemid WHERE c.custid=#{custid};
